abstract: Masayoshi Son, the billionaire founder of Softbank, owns big chunks of Yahoo’s most valuable investment stakes: Yahoo Japan and the Alibaba Group, one of China’s largest Internet companies.
snippet: Masayoshi Son, the billionaire founder of Softbank, owns big chunks of Yahoo’s most valuable investment stakes: Yahoo Japan and the Alibaba Group, one of China’s largest Internet companies.
lead_paragraph: “I shouldn’t make a comment on that,” said Masayoshi Son, the usually voluble serial entrepreneur who is one of the richest men in Japan. “It’s too delicate a question. Too sensitive right now.”

headline.main: A Key Figure in the Future of Yahoo
